content:
I am executing the following operation on Vonk with external terminology server
http://localhost:4080/ValueSet/$expand?url=http://loinc.org/vs&filter=SARS-CoV-2

But the return is giving me all the entries from Loinc without filtering on the term specified.
Is this expected or Am I missing something?

"contains": [
{
"system": "http://loinc.org",
"code": "LA19852-5",
"display": "Yersinia enterocolitica O8"
},
{
"system": "http://loinc.org",
"code": "LP76043-6",
"display": "{Type of task}",
"designation": [
{
"value": "{Type of task}"
}
]
},
{
"system": "http://loinc.org",
"code": "LP56906-8",
"display": "Skin.behavior",
"designation": [
{
"value": "Skin Behavior"
}
]
},
{
"system": "http://loinc.org",
"code": "LP146199-7",
"display": "I avoid going out to eat because of my illness in the past 7D",
"designation": [
{
"value": "I avoid going out to eat because of my illness in the past 7 days"
}
]
}

Hi,

If the external terminology server you are using is https://fhir.loinc.org this result is expected, because the actual expand is done by that server instead of Vonk.
I quickly tested https://fhir.loinc.org/ValueSet/$expand?url=http://loinc.org/vs&filter=SARS-CoV-2 and got the same result.

The LOINC FHIR server is still in Beta, so they might be able to fix this if you contact them.

Kind regards,
Huib
